io.mosip.kernel.masterdata.repository

Interface DeviceRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.mosip.kernel.core.dataaccess.spi.repository.BaseRepository<Device,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Device,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Device,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Device,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Device>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Device,java.lang.String>

    @Repository
public interface DeviceRepository
extends io.mosip.kernel.core.dataaccess.spi.repository.BaseRepository<Device,java.lang.String>
    Repository function to fetching device details
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Megha Tanga

      • findByLangCodeAndIsDeletedFalseOrIsDeletedIsNull

        java.util.List<Device> findByLangCodeAndIsDeletedFalseOrIsDeletedIsNull(java.lang.String langCode)

        Returns:

      • findByLangCodeAndDtypeCode

        @Query(value="select d.id, d.name, d.mac_address, d.serial_num, d.ip_address, d.dspec_id, d.lang_code, d.is_active, d.validity_end_dtimes, s.dtyp_code from master.device_master  d, master.device_spec s where  d.dspec_id = s.id  and d.is_deleted = false  and  d.lang_code = ?1 and s.dtyp_code = ?2",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> findByLangCodeAndDtypeCode(java.lang.String langCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String deviceTypeCode)
        This method trigger query to fetch the Device detail for the given language code and Device Type code.
        Parameters:
        langCode - languageCode provided by user
        deviceTypeCode - device Type Code provided by user
        Returns:
        Device Details fetched from database
